Texts.Chs: 好极了！ ^orange;变形球II^reset;的允许正如我所希望的。请收下它——感谢你，我已经能够在我的研究上取得重大进展！^green;记得随时和我交谈^reset;来开发新技术！
Texts.Eng: Excellent! The ^orange;Distortion Sphere II Tech^reset; performed just as I'd hoped it would. Please, keep it - thanks to you I've been able to make significant strides in my research! Speak with me at any time to ^green;develop new techs^reset;!

Texts.Chs: 我的^orange;变形球II^reset;测试准备就绪！我希望你^green;在我已经布置好的新的障碍设施上测试它^reset;。你可以用^red;[开火键]^reset;投掷炸弹炸掉东西！当你准备好进去的时候再和我说话。 ^reset;
Texts.Eng: My ^orange;Distortion Sphere II Tech^reset; is ready to roll! I'd like you to ^green;test it on the new obstacle course^reset; I've set up. Drop bombs with ^red;[Fire]^reset; to blow things up! ^yellow;Talk to me again when you're ready to go in.^reset;
